name: Katana In-house
metadata_description: This old Katana has no tech inside but is forged in year 1266 back on Earth. It's amazing that even after all these years it can still slice cleanly through an enemy with no effort at all. The Shade warriors took great care of this weapon. We only added our tag on it for a little extra style!

name: Sword Sniper In-house
metadata_description: This weapon Is unlike anything I have ever seen before, the main sniper part is Pyro tech but if the rifle hasn't been fired for a few seconds the whole barrel freezes into a sword blade making the weapon just as deadly in close range!

name: Rifle In-house
metadata_description: The Shade has been experimenting with cybernetics, They stuck a nanite-injected brain into the magazine of this rifle, the result is very interesting it seems to have unlimited ammunition and you can keep holding the trigger, every shot is a compact projectile of self-cloning nanite compacted into a projectile!

name: Pyro Trident In-house
metadata_description: This Trident was already lethal when we found it, even tho it was broken in half, so we fitted it to a fire rod so whenever you sink it into an enemy a massive fireball launches out of the core. Happy BBQ!

name: Pyro Speargun In-house
metadata_description: This speargun is Pyro tech, We modified the bolt to explode on impact dealing massive damage and igniting what ever is left of the enemy soldier. It's truly a scary weapon to shoot!

name: Energy Sword In-house
metadata_description: The main tech of this Energy sword originates from Holtron 7, we have boosted the power power and infused it with extra natnites. The result is outstanding, the 2 blades in front is pure balanced plasma, we havent fount the material that its not able to penetrate instantly!

name: Personal RC Artillery In-house
metadata_description: We found a base long-range rc car on Holtron 7, it automatically follows the user and can drive extremely far away without losing the signal. We fitted a mini artillery cannon on top, this system can track a target with deadly accurcy up to 2km away!

name: The Geiger""
metadata_description: A Special Lysej Radioactive burst rifle finetuned for warfare in harsh places. The weapon emits intense radioactive energy from its stock untill the magazine is empty

name: The Skull Counter""
metadata_description: A special Sniper rifle made by NEU it may look crude but don't be fooled, this weapon is so precisely calibrated that it will never miss its target

name: The Multi-tool""
metadata_description: This Lysej rifle has a unique double magazine that has 2 different types of ammo, making this weapon perfect for long and medium ranges. The short stock is reinforced so it can be used to bash an enemy in close quarters

name: Dragons Breath""
metadata_description: This NEU Sniper rifle shoots a compressed shot of pure fire it is optimized for the Pyro warriors since the whole weapon gets red hot on every shot

name: The Spear""
metadata_description: The Oric Harpoon is crafted for the ber Organic warriors. It shoots a spear at supersonic speeds

name: Iron Igniter""
metadata_description: This VI rifle shoots charged shots of molten iron. It shoots with impresive speeds but will overheat if the wielder is not carful.

name: The Ionizer""
metadata_description: This special VI weapon is made for the Gas warriors. It ionizes pure antimatter into a gas and then shoots it out in a powerful blast the range is much longer than expected!

name: ÜberKill""
metadata_description: This is a very heavy chainsaw made by Oric for the Organics and the ber organics. Don't stand at the wrong side of this saw!

name: Personal Drone In-house
metadata_description: This Is the First Cyber Skulls Custom build weapon the base tech is from Holtron 7 and used by the Neon warriors. This remote-controlled drone has a grenade launcher mounted underneath and a large camera module in the middle, making this weapon ideal for long-distance destruction

name: Uranium Launcher In-house
metadata_description: The second Cyber Skulls Custom build weapon the base tech is from Erica XI and used by the Radioactive warriors. This super radioactive weapon launches Uranium rods that hold enough radiation to kill a small army within seconds plus the rod itself launches with enough power to penetrate clean through 2 fully armored warriors!

name: Radioactive Lucille In-house
metadata_description: This is a simple but effective weapon, silent and highly Radioactive! The wire is so radioactive that it's in a constant 50% solid and 50% liquid state. If the impact doesn't kill the enemy, the radiation will take care of them real quick

name: Skull Flamethrower In-house
metadata_description: We found a leftover skull in our storage and stuck it on a defective flamethrower, injected it with a little dose of Nanite and the result is a very capable flamethrower with a surprisingly long range!

name: The Genesis Cleaver X Mortality
metadata_description: The Mortality (Collab) Cleaver is a 2 handed heavy melee weapon, so sharp it will cut through 5mm steal like it is butter.

name: QuickShot X Mortality
metadata_description: The Mortality (Collab) Quick Shot has 6 active tracking barrels build in. They are all loaded with super heated bolts that can all be fired at once or in very quick and accurate succession due to its low recoil

name: Capt. Xeno's weapon In-house
metadata_description: We have managed to recreate Capt. Xeno's trusty weapon! It was broken when we got it at first. The weapon is primarily a rifle with incendiary rounds, with a radioactive under-barrel shotgun, and last but not least an extremely sharp axe head!

name: Radioactive Axe In-house
metadata_description: The Axe was originally an Axe we found in an old abandoned nuclear reactor, the Geiger counter went crazy on this one! We covered it in a nanocoating that you can swish on or off on the handle when switched off the whole axe start radiating and will with certainty give any enemy radiation poison, so the user has to be careful when using this weapon, not everyone will be able to survive just holding it without the nanocoating active!

name: Broadsword X Little Royals
metadata_description: This Broadsword was found on Holtron 7. It's believed to originate from an alternate universe, ofcourse the Neon has tinkered with it and boosted it with pure plasma! It slashes anything with just a light swing!
